channel.title: CSOH - Cloud Security News
channel.description: Latest cloud security news curated by Cloud Security Office Hours. Covers AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes vulnerabilities, breaches, and more.

item.title: CISA gives feds 3 days to patch actively exploited BeyondTrust flaw
item.description: CISA ordered U.S. government agencies on Friday to secure their BeyondTrust Remote Support instances against an actively exploited vulnerability within three days. [...]

item.description: ecdysis is a Rust library enabling zero-downtime upgrades for network services. After five years protecting millions of connections at Cloudflare, it’s now open source.
